_header: This world is subtle and deceivable
_description: ‘Dum sumus in mundo uiuamus consuetudo’ — one eight-line stanza (ababbcbc)

CamStJohn235.First Lines:
Thys world ys suttel and DissayvabullLaȝghyng whith a
                    flateryng countenaunce…
CamStJohn235.Last Lines:
…Oftymes ys stryken in to the traunceOff a soden fall bott yet
                    ys recouere
CamStJohn235.Note:
Added by a hand of the sixteenth century to originally blank space after
                        5248.
CamStJohn235.Attributed Title: Dum sumus in mundo uiuamus consuetudo (f. 119v)

                Facsimile.
